text: Funny Stories () is a 1962 Soviet comedy film directed by Venyamin Dorman.Детский фильм «Веселые истории» режиссера Вениамина Дормана покажут в кинотеатре «Искра» на севере столицыТакой войны зрители еще не видели It is the first film adapted from Victor Dragunsky's popular children's book The Adventures of Dennis, a collection of short stories told from the perspective of a young boy. == Plot == The film tells about three children living in a usual courtyard in the capital of the Soviet Union. They love to visit the circus and the zoo, but they do not tolerate the semolina and house manager, who always watches them and does not allow them to perform various tricks in the yard.Веселые истории == Cast == * Mikhail Kislyarov as Deniska Korablyev (as Misha Kislyarov) * Aleksandr Kekish as Mishka Slonov (as Sasha Kekish) * Nadezhda Fomintsina as Alenka (as Nadya Fomintsina) * Yelena Druzhinina as Lenochka (as Lena Druzhinina) * Tamara Loginova as Antonina Korablyeva * Georgi Tusuzov as Yubilyar (as G.
